HOMEPAGE.POPULAR_PLATFORMS_INFO: List of the most active and popular artificial intelligence platforms

HERO.TITLE: The World's Best AI Tools Directory
HERO.SUBTITLE: Best AI Tools Directory
HERO.DESC1: Bindeye is a website dedicated to artificial intelligence that helps you discover the best AI tools available online. Our platform features a curated directory organized into clear categories so you can instantly find the tools that match your needs.
HERO.DESC2: You will find the largest AI tools listing updated daily, making Bindeye the most reliable hub for discovering innovative AI solutions.
HERO.DESC3: We also publish articles explaining how each AI works. Found a tool not listed yet? You can now submit your own AIs so they can be added to the rankings or to the Top 10.
HERO.DESC4: Bindeye is both a directory and a search engine fully dedicated to AI—simple, clean, and efficient. Just search using keywords, like on a standard search engine.

GUIDE.TITLE: Bindeye: Your Guide to Discovering the Best AI
GUIDE.SUBTITLE: A Practical AI Guide
GUIDE.TEXT1: Our website is clean, clear, and optimized to provide fast results. It is free, requires no registration, and is fully compatible with computers, tablets, and smartphones.
GUIDE.TEXT2: Whether you're looking for a machine translation tool, an AI image generator, or any other intelligent application, Bindeye offers a wide variety of high-quality options.
GUIDE.TEXT3: We also publish content created by AI experts to help you understand the latest trends and most promising technologies.

TOP10.TITLE: Top 10 Best AI Tools
TOP10.TEXT1: Bindeye now features a unique Top 10 AI section that updates in real time. You can instantly see the top-ranked AI tools in each category—an essential feature when new apps appear every day.
TOP10.TEXT2: With this constant expansion, AI directories can quickly become unreadable. The Top 10 simplifies everything by highlighting only the most innovative and useful AIs.
TOP10.TEXT3: Check the "Top 10" tab at the top of the page to explore the ranking.

ENTHUSIASTS.TITLE: A Website for All AI Enthusiasts and Aficionados
ENTHUSIASTS.TEXT1: Bindeye is intentionally designed to be simple and accessible, making it ideal both for beginners and experts looking for cutting-edge AI innovations.
ENTHUSIASTS.TEXT2: Since AI tools are now a major part of daily life—and the future—staying informed is essential. Bindeye helps you remain up to date and one step ahead of the competition.

WHY.TITLE: Why Come to This AI Tools Directory?
WHY.TEXT1: Whether you're curious, researching, or searching for a specific AI, Bindeye gives you access to the most extensive AI collection categorized and easy to browse.
WHY.TEXT2: You can also learn how each AI in our directory works and discover tools shared by other members of the community.
WHY.TEXT3: Two new sections have recently been added:
WHY.TEXT4: Both are extremely popular and updated regularly.

COMMUNITY.TITLE: Contribute to the Community by Sharing Your Findings on Bindeye
COMMUNITY.TEXT1: Bindeye promotes community participation because AI discovery is a collective journey.
COMMUNITY.TEXT2: Everyone can contribute—beginners, developers, and AI enthusiasts—by sharing new AI tools via our submission form.
COMMUNITY.TEXT3: This helps us keep the directory updated while allowing you to share your discoveries with thousands of users.

CLOSING.TEXT1: Thank you for your support and for being part of the Bindeye community.

COOKIE_POLICY.TITLE: Cookie Policy (EU)
COOKIE_POLICY.INTRO: This Cookie Policy was last updated on 16 October 2025 and applies to citizens and legal permanent residents of the European Economic Area and Switzerland.

1.TITLE: 1. Introduction
1.TEXT: Our website, https://www.bindeye.com (hereinafter: "the website"), uses cookies and similar technologies (collectively referred to as "cookies").

2.TITLE: 2. What are cookies?
2.TEXT: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to ensure proper website functionality and improve user experience.

3.TITLE: 3. Why we use cookies
3.TEXT: We use cookies to make our website work correctly, remember your preferences, and analyze anonymous traffic data to improve performance.

4.TITLE: 4. Placed cookies
4.TEXT: Only functional and essential cookies are used to ensure website performance and security.

5.TITLE: 5. Consent
5.TEXT: By continuing to browse www.bindeye.com, you consent to the use of these essential cookies. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but parts of the website may not function properly.

6.TITLE: 6. Manage your consent settings
6.TEXT: Only strictly necessary cookies are active.

7.TITLE: 7. Your rights
7.TEXT: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data at any time.

1.TITLE: 1. Introduction
1.TEXT: These Terms and Conditions apply to the website https://www.bindeye.com and to all transactions related to our products and services. By accessing or using this website, you agree to these Terms.

2.TITLE: 2. Intellectual Property
2.TEXT: All content, designs, data, and materials on this website are the property of Bindeye or its licensors. You may not reproduce, copy, or distribute any material without prior written consent.

3.TITLE: 3. Use of the Website
3.TEXT: You agree to use this website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. Any unauthorized use, such as data scraping, hacking, or misuse of content, is strictly prohibited.

4.TITLE: 4. Third-Party Links
4.TEXT: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. Bindeye is not responsible for the content, privacy practices, or reliability of those sites.

5.TITLE: 5. Liability Disclaimer
5.TEXT: The website and all content are provided "as is." Bindeye does not guarantee uninterrupted access or the accuracy of information. We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from your use of the website.

6.TITLE: 6. Privacy & Cookies
6.TEXT: We value your privacy and handle all personal data according to our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy.

7.TITLE: 7. Termination
7.TEXT: We may suspend or terminate your access to the website at any time if you violate these Terms or misuse our services.

8.TITLE: 8. Governing Law
8.TEXT: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by the laws of Wyoming, USA. Any disputes will fall under the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts in Sheridan, Wyoming.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.BREADCRUMB: Home → Privacy Policy Last updated: 28 June 2024

1.TITLE: 1. Introduction
1.TEXT: This Privacy Policy explains how Bindeye collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you visit https://www.bindeye.com or interact with our products and services. By using our website, you agree to the terms of this Policy.

2.TITLE: 2. Data We Collect
2.TEXT: We may collect the following information:
2.LIST:
• Account information: name, email address, or wallet address (if applicable).
  • Technical data: IP address, browser type, and usage analytics.
  • Communication data: messages or inquiries sent through our contact forms or email.
2.TEXT2: We only collect information necessary to operate our services and ensure security and performance.

3.TITLE: 3. How We Use Your Data
3.LIST:
• Provide access to our services.
  • Improve website performance and user experience.
  • Communicate with you regarding support, updates, or important notifications.
  • Comply with legal and regulatory obligations.
3.TEXT2: We never sell or rent your personal data.

4.TITLE: 4. Data Sharing
4.TEXT: We may share limited data with:
4.LIST:
• Trusted service providers (hosting, analytics, payment processors).
  • Legal authorities, if required by law.
  • Partners assisting in the secure operation of our platform.
4.TEXT2: All third parties are bound by strict confidentiality and security agreements.

5.TITLE: 5. Data Retention
5.TEXT: We retain your data only as long as necessary for the purposes listed above or as required by law.

6.TITLE: 6. Security
6.TEXT: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, or loss. However, no digital transmission or storage method is entirely risk-free.

7.TITLE: 7. Cookies
7.TEXT: Our website uses minimal essential cookies to ensure proper functionality. For more details, please see our Cookie Policy.

8.TITLE: 8. Your Rights
8.LIST:
• Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
  • Withdraw consent for data processing.
  • Request data portability (when applicable).
8.TEXT2: To exercise your rights, contact us at contact@bindeye.com

9.TITLE: 9. International Transfers
9.TEXT: Data may be processed or stored in the United States, following safeguards consistent with data protection regulations.

10.TITLE: 10. Updates to This Policy
10.TEXT: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with a revised "last updated" date.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Here are a few quick answers about submitting, updating, or promoting AI tools on Bindeye.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: Here are a few quick answers about submitting, updating, or promoting AI tools on Bindeye.

SUBMIT_TOOL.QUESTION: How do I submit a new AI tool?
SUBMIT_TOOL.ANSWER: To submit a new AI tool, please use our dedicated submission page. Fill in the details about your product and our team will review your submission before it goes live.

FEATURE_TOOL.QUESTION: How can I feature my tool on Bindeye?
FEATURE_TOOL.ANSWER: If you want extra visibility, you can request a featured placement. Find details about highlight options and how your listing can stand out.

ADVERTISE.QUESTION: How can I advertise on Bindeye?
ADVERTISE.ANSWER: For advertising opportunities, please visit our Advertise section. You will find more information about placements, formats, and how to reach our audience.

UPDATE_TOOL.QUESTION: How do I update information about my AI tool?
UPDATE_TOOL.ANSWER: If your tool is already listed and you need to update the description, pricing, or links, use the update page and provide the changes.

CONTACT_DIRECT.QUESTION: Can I contact you directly by email?
CONTACT_DIRECT.ANSWER: Yes. If you prefer contacting us directly, you can email us. We usually reply within 24 to 48 business hours.
